creator: Wearible Solutions
descriptionHtml:
Wear Casts is a standalone podcast player for Wear OS smartwatches. Stream your favorite podcasts or download them directly to your smartwatch.

Pair Bluetooth headphones to your WearOS smartwatch and listen to your favorite podcasts without your phone.

Features:

* Schedule or manual downloading

* Custom playlists

* Built in playlists downloaded and in progress episodes

* Import an OPML

* Searchable podcast directory

* Periodic background syncing and notification of new episodes

* Remembers position for each podcast

* Responds to external audio controls

*Set time to start and end episodes to skip the beginning and end (Premium feature)

* Control playback speed (Premium feature)


Recommended device requirements:

At least 1 GB of RAM
Android 7.0 and above

ATTENTION: This app works on Wear OS watches only and not others such as Samsung, Amazfit or Fitbit devices.

Note: Phone is required for importing podcasts only.

Storage permission: save podcasts and artwork to your device

Phone state permission: pause/play when a call comes in
descriptionShort: A Wear OS podcast app. Stream or download podcasts for offline playback.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Fix for menu not working on episode list

title: Wear Casts: A podcast player for WearOS watches

descriptionHtml:
Wear Casts is a standalone podcast player for Wear OS smartwatches. Stream your favorite podcasts or download them directly to your smartwatch.

title: Wear Casts: Podcast app for WearOS

creator: Wearible Solutions
descriptionHtml:
Wear Casts is a standalone podcast player for Wear OS smartwatches. Stream your favorite podcasts or download them directly to your smartwatch.

Pair Bluetooth headphones to your WearOS smartwatch and listen to your favorite podcasts without your phone.

Features:

* Schedule or manual downloading

* Custom playlists

* Built in playlists downloaded and in progress episodes

* Import an OPML

* Searchable podcast directory

* Periodic background syncing and notification of new episodes

* Remembers position for each podcast

* Responds to external audio controls

*Set time to start and end episodes to skip the beginning and end (Premium feature)

* Control playback speed (Premium feature)


Recommended device requirements:

At least 1 GB of RAM
Android 8.0 and above

ATTENTION: This app works on Wear OS watches only and not others such as Samsung, Amazfit or Fitbit devices.

Note: Phone is required for importing podcasts only.

Phone state permission: pause/play when a call comes in
descriptionShort: A WearOS standalone podcast app. Stream or download podcasts to your watch..

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Added ambient mode to other sections of app

Add a list of keywords and any episodes that contain those keywords will automatically be added to a playlist. Add keywords in phone app under Settings.

UI tweaks and bug fixes.

title: Wear Casts

creator: Wearible Solutions
descriptionHtml:
Wear Casts is a standalone podcast player for Wear OS smartwatches.

Download podcasts for offline playback or stream them.

Connect a set of Bluetooth headphones to your WearOS smartwatch and listen to your favorite podcasts without your phone on you.

Features:

* Custom playlists

* Sync position between watch and phone app

* Add keywords and episodes that contain those keywords will automatically be downloaded

* Import podcasts using using RSS feeds or an OPML file

* Auto-download new episodes

* Upload custom files to watch

Note: phone is for importing podcasts and unlocking Premium functionality.
descriptionShort: A standalone podcast player for WearOS.

title: Wear Casts: WearOS podcast app

creator: Wearible Solutions
descriptionHtml:
Wear Casts is the most popular standalone podcast player for Wear OS smartwatches. Stream or download podcasts for offline playback and listen without your phone on you.

Connect Bluetooth headphones directly to your WearOS smartwatch and listen to your favorite podcasts. The phone app also supports playback with the position syncing between devices.

If that wasn't enough, you can also send custom audio files for playback on the watch.

Features:

* Custom playlists

* Sync position between watch and phone app

* Keyword monitoring

* Import podcasts using using RSS feeds or an OPML file

* Auto-download episodes

* Upload custom files to watch

Note: Wear Casts works only on smartwatches running Google's WearOS. It does not run on Samsung's watches running Tizen OS which is any Samsung watch before the Galaxy Watch 4.
descriptionShort: A podcast player for WearOS smartwatches.

If that wasn't enough, you can also send custom audio files for playback on the watch.

Features:

* Custom playlists

* Sync position between watch and phone app

* Keyword monitoring

* Import podcasts using using RSS feeds or an OPML file

* Auto-download episodes

* Upload custom files to watch

Runs on both the Google Pixel Watch and Samsung Galaxy watches
descriptionShort: A podcast player for WearOS smartwatches.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Fixed bug from last release that prevented sending episodes from phone to watch
Added a downloads status notification that can be disabled in watch app
Removed color from ambient progress circle
Small UI changes

title: Wear Casts: WearOS podcast app

creator: Wearible Solutions
descriptionHtml:
Wear Casts is the most popular standalone podcast player for Wear OS smartwatches. Stream or download podcasts for offline playback and listen without your phone on you.

Connect Bluetooth headphones directly to your WearOS smartwatch and listen to your favorite podcasts. The phone app also supports playback with the position syncing between devices.

If that wasn't enough, you can also send custom audio files for playback on the watch.

Features:

* Custom playlists

* Sync position between watch and phone app

* Keyword monitoring

* Import podcasts using using RSS feeds or an OPML file

* Auto-download episodes

* Upload custom files to watch

Runs on both the Google Pixel Watch and Samsung Galaxy watches
descriptionShort: A podcast player for WearOS smartwatches.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Added time to top of podcast list in watch app
Download progress shown in episode list and playlists in watch app
